snippet.title: 99 Bricks Wizard Academy Android
snippet.description:
You've always dreamed of becoming a wizard, only one thing is missing: your own wizard tower! Use all your magical skills to defy gravity and build the highest tower the world has ever seen. But watch out for the other wizards, they will stop at nothing to crumble your creation.

99 Bricks Wizard Academy is a fun and fast paced endless physics builder.

Upgrade your magical abilities to improve your building skills. Go on challenging missions, dress like a leprechaun and beat the other wizards with their own staff!

Download 99 Bricks Wizard Academy for Android at:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=nl.weirdbeard.brickswizardacademy
